Package id.xfunction

Class XRE

  • Object
    • Throwable
      • Exception
        • RuntimeException
          • XRuntimeException
            • XRE
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    public class XRE
extends XRuntimeException

    An alias for XRuntimeException which is very useful in Java scripting.

    
 throw new XRE("Message");
    Instead super long: 
    
 throw new XRuntimeException("Message");
    See Also:
